mapper.insert: insert into travelcommend (travel_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, schedule, type) values (#{travel.id}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{coverUrl}, #{schedule}, #{type})
mapper.update: update travelcommend set title = #{title}, subTitle = #{subTitle}, coverUrl = #{coverUrl}, schedule = #{schedule}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, travel_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, schedule, type from travelcommend
select tc.*,t.author_id,u.nickName,u.headImgUrl,t.createTime from travelcommend tc JOIN travel t on t.id = tc.travel_id JOIN user u on u.id=t.author_id
